channel.title: Come on now people
channel.description:
I've been working on coding a 317 server lately, and im having issues adding the timer for cwars... I've coded every object... I got the pwnscape source and it "had cwars" but no objects worked.... stairs didn't go up or down.. portals didn't teleport.. It was a freaking joke, but ive added pretty much added every aspect of cwars, the only thing i can't figure out is:
HOW DO YOU ADD A TIMER! ~A timer for the waiting lobby; ~A timer for the actual game itself; ~An interface that displays remaining time.
Also, i plan to release the source when im done with it, (cwars is probably the smallest thing i've done to the server).
So people be excited. The first 317 with working cwars(I THINK, IVE NEVER SEEN A 317 WITH WORKING CWARS!) and much more never before seen things

item.title: Come on now people

item.title: Come on now people
item.dc:creator: @Infineon Infineon
item.description:
@Infineon wrote:

thanks mate, my bad for “spamming”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2009, 04:32:31 pm[/size][hr]Oh come on now man… can u just give me a direct link for a tut? that’d be nice… Im no rookie to java coding, i’ve just never made a timer…

Read full topic

item.title: Come on now people
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Posting a thread multiple times is not going to get you answers; it is also against the rules. If you want to learn how to do that, visit this amazing website -
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

Read full topic
